actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of our national motto on coins and currency.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the national motto, "In God We Trust," shall be reaffirmed and shall continue to be engraved and printed on coins and currency.

titles.title: A resolution to reaffirm the use of our national motto on coins and currency.
